mapper.select: INSERT INTO cart (item_id, cart_quantity, last_modified) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{incomingQuantity}, NOW()) ON CONFLICT (item_id) DO UPDATE SET cart_quantity = cart.cart_quantity + EXCLUDED.cart_quantity, last_modified = NOW() RETURNING cart_quantity;

SELECT cart.item_id AS itemId, stock.nama AS itemName, cart.cart_quantity AS quantity, stock.harga AS price, stock.harga * cart.cart_quantity AS subTotal FROM cart INNER JOIN stock ON stock.code_barang = cart.item_id ORDER BY cart.last_modified
SELECT sum(stock.harga * cart.cart_quantity) FROM cart INNER JOIN stock ON stock.code_barang = cart.item_id
SELECT cart.item_id as itemId, cart.cart_quantity as quantity FROM cart
